name: TextStyle
description: Used to describes the style of grid text

content.name: colour
content.description:
the colour of the text
default: {r:0.0, g:1.0, b:0.0, a:0.0}

content.name: font
content.description:
the font used for the text
default: "helvetica"

content.name: horizontal_position_offset
content.description:
the offset of text rendered against the horizontal markings
default: -none-

content.name: vertical_position_offset
content.description:
the offset of text rendered against the vertical markings
default: -none-
